SELECT IFNULL(MAX(annboard_num), 0) + 1 FROM announce_board
INSERT INTO announce_board (annboard_num, user_num, annboard_title, annboard_content, annboard_department, annboard_importance, annboard_fix, annboard_date) VALUES (#{annboardNum}, #{userNum}, #{annboardTitle}, #{annboardContent}, #{annboardDepartment}, #{annboardImportance}, #{annboardFix}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT announce_board.*, user.user_profile_picture, user.user_department, user.user_name FROM announce_board LEFT JOIN user ON announce_board.user_num = user.user_num WHERE announce_board.annboard_num = #{number}

SELECT u.user_name, u.user_profile_picture, u.department_id, u.position_id, d.department_name AS departmentName, p.position_name AS positionName, CASE WHEN v.announce_board_num IS NOT NULL THEN v.checked ELSE 0 END AS viewCheck FROM user u JOIN user_departments d ON u.department_id = d.department_id JOIN user_positions p ON u.position_id = p.position_id LEFT JOIN view_check v ON u.user_num = v.user_num AND v.announce_board_num = #{annboardNum} WHERE u.department_id != 0 AND u.position_id != 0 ORDER BY u.position_id
SELECT department_name FROM user_departments WHERE department_id != 0

SELECT count(u.user_num) FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_departments d ON u.department_id = d.department_id
WHERE d.department_name = #{targetDepartment}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT u.user_num) AS user_count FROM user u INNER JOIN user_departments d ON u.department_id = d.department_id INNER JOIN view_check v ON u.user_num = v.user_num
WHERE d.department_name = #{targetDepartment} AND v.checked = 1
WHERE v.checked = 1
AND v.announce_board_num = #{annboardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE announce_board SET annboard_importance = 1, annboard_fix = 0 WHERE annboard_num = #{annboardNum}
